response.overview: The life of an unsuccessful writer is transformed by a top-secret 'smart drug' that allows him to use 100% of his brain and become a perfect version of himself. His enhanced abilities soon attract shadowy forces that threaten his new life.
response.tagline: Everything is possible when you open your mind.
response.title: Limitless

titles.title: Ohne Limit - Die Droge für Reichtum und Macht
